terms-conditions-page.page-subtitle: Before we finalize your application, we’d like you to read through a few things.  Unfortunately, none are on the Best Sellers lists…

terms-conditions-page.terms_text_5: Regarding my Taxpayer Identification Number, I have read and agree to:

I consent to Vast Bank, N.A. confirming to my employer that I have an account at the institution by sharing the legal name and e-mail address associated with my Meed Banking Club accounts.
terms-conditions-page.corporate-terms-not-share-checkbox: Do not share. I understand I will not be eligible for the fee rebate.

signup-deny-page.page-subtitle: Your application can’t be approved by the bank at this time.

signup-approved-page.page-subtitle: And your encrypted data is safe and secure.  You can enjoy the benefits of membership with total confidence!
signup-approved-page.footer-text: One step to go - move money into your account.

scan-id.description-text-1: Important Information About Procedures for Opening a New Account
scan-id.description-text-2: To help the government fight the funding of terrorism and money laundering activities, Federal law requires all financial institutions to obtain, verify, and record information that identifies each person who opens an account.
scan-id.description-text-3: This means that when you open an account, we’ll ask for your name, address, date of birth, and other information that will allow us to identify you. Next step is to scan your driver's license, passport or State I.D., then take a selfie.

general-info-page.permission-text: By entering your telephone number and clicking "Next", you are giving us permission to contact you about this application

beneficiary-modal.title: Beneficiary Info
beneficiary-modal.text: Your Beneficiary is who would receive your Meed account funds in the unfortunate event of your passing.

account-funding-page.content-info: Welcome back!!! if you've already made your initial deposit, we must be within that pesky wait period...otherwise...

details.content1: SPEI is a transfer initiated at one bank to deposit funds into another bank
details.content2: It’s real simple to do.  Just head to your current bank and request to deposit SPEI to your new Meed account.

details.content1: OXXO Money Deposit can be made by depositing cash at an OXXO store into your bank account
details.content2: It’s real simple to do.  Just head to an OXXO store and request to deposit money to your new Meed account.

spei-option.title: SPEI transfer from other bank
spei-option.subtitle1: Just head to your current bank and request to deposit SPEI to your new Meed account.
spei-option.subtitle2: Your deposit will only take moments to reach your account. You can start to set up direct deposit or Login below.

oxxo-option.title: OXXO Money Deposit
oxxo-option.subtitle1: Just head to your closest OXXO location and request to deposit SPEI to your Meed account.
oxxo-option.subtitle2: It can take up to 24 hours for your OXXO deposit to make it to your account. You can start the direct deposit process with your employer or

direct-deposit-start.header-text: Let’s move money into your account.
direct-deposit-start.subtitle-text: Congratulations, you’ve been approved! Now let’s move money into your account.
direct-deposit-start.direct-deposit-info-text: You can use either an eCheck bank transfer or a credit or debit card

direct-deposit-info.header-text: Get paid for getting paid instantly!
direct-deposit-info.info-text-1: Direct deposit allows your employer to send your pay instantly to your Meed account–get paid 2-4 days quicker than with a check.  No more waiting or check-cashing fees.
direct-deposit-info.info-text-2: You tell us your employer’s company name. We’ll email you a form with your details filled in. You check it, then hand it to your employer. They’ll do the rest!
direct-deposit-info.info-text-3: The month after your first direct deposit is made, you’ll receive $9.95 cash back in your Checking account.
direct-deposit-info.info-text-4: And you’ll also earn a Share, entitling you to MeedShare cash back from the bank every month.

direct-deposit-setup.info-paragraph-text-1: Direct Deposit allows your employer to pay you instantly, 2-4 days faster than with a check.
direct-deposit-setup.info-paragraph-text-2: Have a pre-filled form emailed back to you. The paperwork’s all done.

direct-deposit.subtitle-text: Please enter the name of your Employer below. We will email you a Direct Deposit form which you can submit to your employer.
direct-deposit.checkbox-text: I agree to receive via email a Direct Deposit form which includes my Employer's Name, my Bank Account Number and Routing Number.

direct-deposit-complete.info-text: Please check your email for the direct deposit form.  Once you’ve checked all the correct information is in there, hand it to your employer – they’ll do the rest.
direct-deposit-complete.info-text-2: Remember – after your first direct deposit, you’ll receive $9.95 cash back and be entitled to MeedShare!

deposit-thank-you.thank-you-title: Thank you! This payment is now settled.

invite-page.sub-header-title: Enjoy extra earnings when you invite friends and family who join the Club.

invite-new-member-confirm.invite-message:
You should join me as a member of the Meed Banking Club – Meed is better together!,

You get a great way to manage all your everyday banking straight from your phone, plus there are 3 cash back programs that could help you earn $100s and save $100s – it could be like having an extra paycheck a year!

invite-success-modal.success-modal-title: Nice job! You'll earn a Share for everyone who joins and keeps an active account!

account-info-page.disclaimer-text: This is your personal account information. Please use caution when sharing.

card-status-page.disclaimer-text-1: If you’ve temporarily lost or misplaced your Meed card, freeze it and it’ll be disabled until you find it.
card-status-page.disclaimer-text-2: When you do find it, come back here, unfreeze it and use it as normal.

card-lost-page.header-text: Report lost or stolen Meed card
card-lost-page.stolen-text-1: If your Meed card is ever lost or stolen, assistance is only a phone call away. Call us immediately and a Bank representative will review your account for any unauthorized transactions.
card-lost-page.stolen-text-2: Please note that, when you report your debit card as lost or stolen, we will immediately deactivate your card and send a new card with a new number for your protection.
card-lost-page.header-text-2: To report a lost or stolen card, call

modal.title: Choose one of the following actions

statements-page.successful-file-download-toast: Your file has been downloaded, please check the app directory folder.

contact-us-page.container-subheader: Get help and support, troubleshoot your service or get in touch with us.

note.text1: All documents must be current. We will not accept expired IDs.
note.text2: All four corners of the document and all information needed for verification of the change request must be clearly visible.
note.text3: Please, provide images of both the front and the back of a photo ID.
note.text4: If the document requires a signature, it must be hand-signed. We cannot accept electronic signatures.
note.text5: Government-issued documents (such as a state issued ID or passports) must be in color. Black-and-white photos of other documents will be accepted.

permission-info-modal.title: Enable Camera and Storage
permission-info-modal.details: Please enable Camera and Storage from the settings.

contact-preference.invex-bank-header: Meed Banking Powered by Invex Bank, N.A.
contact-preference.invex-bank-sub-header: These notifications provide you with alerts for balance changes, fraud, transactions, one-time passwords, offers, and more.
contact-preference.meed-sub-header: These notifications provide you the latest updates on MeedShare, MeedExtras, MeedTravel and MeedCover.

privacy-legal-page.body-title: Click to view any of the documents below.

sweep.sweep-message: "Sweep" helps minimize the interest owed on your Line of Credit by automatically transferring available funds from your Checking account at the end of each day to pay down the credit balance faster. This is a great alternative if you prefer not to wait until the monthly payment is due.

error-message-module.code-604: Thank you for submitting your information for a Meed Banking Club account. We regret to inform you that we’re unable to accommodate your request at this time. The Social Security records associated with the information you provided are attributed to a person who is a minor. Please contact the IRS if this information is incorrect.
error-message-module.code-605: Thank you for submitting your information for a Meed Banking Club account. We regret to inform you that we’re unable to accommodate your request at this time. The Social Security records associated with the information you provided are attributed to a person who is deceased. Please contact the IRS if this information is incorrect.

code-609.modal-adverse-action-message: We are sorry but we are unable to accommodate your request to open a deposit account with our financial institution at this time.  Our decision was based in whole or in part on information obtained in a report from the consumer reporting agency listed below.  You have a right under the Fair Credit Reporting Act to know the information contained in your file at the consumer reporting agency. The reporting agency played no part in our decision and is unable to supply specific reasons why we have denied your request to open a deposit account in our institution. You also have a right to a free copy of your report from the reporting agency, if you request it no later than 60 days after you receive this notice. In addition, if you find that any information contained in the report you receive is inaccurate or incomplete, you have the right to dispute the matter with the reporting agency.
code-609.modal-adverse-action-footer: If you have any questions regarding your consumer report, you should contact the consumer reporting agency using the contact information above.

error-message-module.code-610: Thank you for applying for Meed Banking Club. Based on the information provided we are unable to complete your application. For questions on the application process please call Meed Banking Club at 1(833)-213-6333. Ref ID Authentication.
error-message-module.code-611: Thank you for applying for Meed Banking Club. Based on the information provided we are unable to complete your application. For questions on the application process please call Meed Banking Club at 1(833)-213-6333. Ref ID Authentication.

home.page-title: Manage your monthly bills and recurring payments.
home.biller-direct-details: Pay top digital billers such as Netflix, AT&T, Hulu etc.
home.bill-pay-details: Pay anybody electronically or by check.
home.card-swap-details: Consolidate all of your subscription payments in one place.

biller-direct-modal.title: Pay with Debit Card
biller-direct-modal.details: Pay using your Meed Visa Debit Card through over 5,000 billers' websites. Add your bills, then make or schedule payments.

bill-pay-service-modal.title: Bill Pay Service
bill-pay-service-modal.details: Pay virtually anyone or any company through your Meed Checking account. Electronic payment usually takes 1-3 business days. Set reminders, securely pay your bills and schedule recurring payments.

card-swap-modal.title: CardSwap
card-swap-modal.details: Register your MeedCard with your service and subscription providers, then any change or update in card details can be handled one time – in seconds.

send-money-internationally.page-header: Send money from the United States to friends and family in other countries!
send-money-internationally.page-sub-header: Meed is building out its network of Member banks around the globe to provide you access to low cost, immediate money transfers. Until your destination country is available you might try one of the third party providers below.
send-money-internationally.international-transferPage-message-1: Meed offers links to other third party  websites that may be interest to our members and are provided solely for your convenience.
send-money-internationally.international-transferPage-message-2: Meed is not responsible for the content of linked third party website. We are not an agent for these third parties nor do we endorse or guarantee their products. We make no representation or warranty regarding the accuracy of the information contained in the linked sites. We suggest that you always verify the information obtained from linked websites before acting upon this information.

rewards.reward-earn-even-more-content: Try MeedRewards™️ and earn up to 5% cash back.

details.content1: An eCheck withdraws money from another bank account, then deposits it in your Meed account.
details.content2: It’s real simple to use.  Just log in to your bank’s site using your secure, personalized credentials.

details.content1: COMING SOON! An eTransfer (ACH) allows money to be moved from your other bank account into your Meed account. To use an eTransfer you’ll need your other bank’s account details.
There is a pass-through charge of 3% that will be added to your card transaction.
Please allow meed to use location services from the settings.
Your Line of Credit (LOC) automatically kicks in when your Checking account is empty.
details.content2: Through your LOC you can borrow 75% of whatever you have in your Savings account.
details.content3: If you’ve $100 in Savings, your LOC is $75.
details.content4: The interest rate on your Line of Credit is currently: {{interestRate}}% APR
details.content5: For more info, see ‘Virtual Assistant’ under ‘Contact Us’ in the More menu.

details.content1: Your available balance combines money available in your checking account with credit available on your Line of Credit. This helps protect your savings by giving you added spending power whenever you need it.
details.content2: Available money is all payments and deposits that have been fully processed and released by the bank.  Available Savings also adjusts to take into account any use you’ve made on your Line of Credit.
details.content3: This is the total cash back you’re earned through MeedExtras, MeedTravel and MeedShare.
details.content4: For more info, see ‘Virtual Assistant’ under ‘Contact Us’ in the More menu.

details.content1: Goal Savings lets you choose what you’re saving for, then how much a month you want to save towards it. Every day the app calculates how much you still need to save to hit your target.
details.content2: Funds on Hold reflect the security amount for money borrowed on the Line of Credit, which is then adjusted to ensure your borrowings won’t exceed 75% of your Savings balance. Also here are any pending transactions not fully cleared and released by the bank. Funds on Hold will move to Available when pending transactions are released or when the Line of Credit balance is reduced or paid in full.
details.content3: The Interest Rate on your Savings is currently: 1.25% APY, {{interestRate}}% YTD
details.content4: Boost your savings further by maximizing your cash back from MeedExtras, MeedTravel and MeedShare – they pay directly into your savings account.

details.content1: An eCheck withdraws money from another bank account, then deposits it in your Meed account.
details.content2: It’s real simple to use.  Just log in to your bank’s site using your secure, personalized credentials.

details.content1: You can use either a credit or debit card to move money into your new Meed account.  You’ll just need to enter your card details.
COMING SOON! An eTransfer(ACH) allows money to be moved from your other bank account into your Meed account. To use an eTransfer you'll need your other bank's account details

details.content-list:
Daily - 1 transaction
Weekly - 3 transactions
Monthly - 5 transactions
details.content-description: If you exceed your limit, please consider setting up direct deposit or mobile check deposit.

close-account-echeck-card-info.detail: Thank you for logging into the Meed Banking Club App. Your Meed Banking Club accounts have been closed. For additional information, please dial 1(833)-213-6333 to speak with a Customer Service Representative.

scan-id.jumio-camera-permission-error-message: In order for us to assist you with the application, you will be required to take a picture of one of the your IDs from the list below, followed by a picture of yourself.

coming-soon-feature.title: Coming Soon!
coming-soon-feature.details: We’re working hard to bring you this and other useful ways to manage your money. Please check back with us later!

main-page.zero-invite-sub-header: You earn a Share for anyone you have join Meed for as long as they keep an active account. The more Shares you have, the greater your portion of MeedShare.
main-page.non-zero-invite-sub-header: You earn a Share for anyone you have join Meed for as long as they keep an active account. The more Shares you have, the greater your portion of MeedShare.
main-page.modal-text-1: Every month, Meed’s Member Banks return a set portion of the revenues generated by Meed Banking Club accounts. This is MeedShare.
main-page.modal-text-2: And every month, MeedShare is divided up by the number of ”Shares” among all members worldwide. You earn a Share by having someone open a Meed account at your invitation, and you keep that Share for as long as that account remains open and active.
main-page.modal-text-3: A member with 2 Shares will receive twice as much money as someone with 1 Share, and so on.
main-page.modal-text-4: App - MeedShareIn addition, you’ll receive $9.95 cash back in Checking each time your first 12 invitees complete 3 months’ membership.
main-page.modal-text-5: Bring us 12 members and we’ll also credit your Savings with an extra $50.  Make it 24, and we’ll make it another $100.

invite-card-component.sub-header: Enjoy extra earnings when you welcome friends and family who join the Club.

permission-request.title: Meed Biometric Sign On
permission-request.description: Meed use face ID or finger print for biometric authentication

main-page.description-text: Every Meed Banking Club member is covered with $10,000 Accidental Death insurance.

app-upgrade.force-message: Current version of app is outdated. Please update in order to log in.
app-upgrade.soft-message: A new version of Meed app is now available.

main-page.description-text-1: When you book with MeedTravel you get ​amazingly low prices, as well as:​
main-page.description-text-2: Up to 10% cash back when you use your ​Meed Visa debit card.
main-page.description-text-3: Up to 5% cash back on all other credit cards.
main-page.cash-back-text: Please note that cash back can take up to 90 days to be credited to your Savings account. Cancellation will see any cash back automatically reversed.
main-page.modal-description: You’re now leaving the Meed app and going to a third-party website with different Terms & Conditions.

signup-credentials-created.message: you’re just minutes away from amazing banking. Please Log in to complete Bank Application

otp-modal-verification.title: Please enter code
otp-modal-verification.info-text: For your security, we’ve sent a confirmation code to your mobile phone. Please enter it above to continue.

logout-success-modal.message: Thanks for being a part of the Meed Banking Club community!
